|blank1_info = 1267391 |website = |footnotes = }} Flandreau is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of Moody County. It became a city in 1902, and 2,372 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Flandreau website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1902 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in South Dakota
